Structs/DocumentCounts.html#/s:11Discove.name: available
Structs/DocumentCounts.html#/s:11Discove.abstract: The total number of available documents in the collection.

Structs/DocumentCounts.html#/s:11Discove.name: processing
Structs/DocumentCounts.html#/s:11Discove.abstract: The number of documents in the collection that are currently being processed.

Structs/DocumentCounts.html#/s:11Discove.name: failed
Structs/DocumentCounts.html#/s:11Discove.abstract: The number of documents in the collection that failed to be ingested.

Structs/NluEnrichmentRelations.html#/s:1.name: model
Structs/NluEnrichmentRelations.html#/s:1.abstract: For use with natural_language_understanding enrichments only.* The enrichement model to use with relationship extraction. May be a custom model provided by Watson Knowledge Studio, the public model for use with Knowledge Graph en-news, the default isen-news.

Structs/Term.html#/s:11DiscoveryV14TermV.name: type
Structs/Term.html#/s:11DiscoveryV14TermV.abstract: The type of aggregation command used. For example: term, filter, max, min, etc.

Structs/Term.html#/s:11DiscoveryV14TermV.name: field
Structs/Term.html#/s:11DiscoveryV14TermV.abstract: The field where the aggregation is located in the document.

Structs/Nested.html#/s:11DiscoveryV16Nes.name: type
Structs/Nested.html#/s:11DiscoveryV16Nes.abstract: The type of aggregation command used. For example: term, filter, max, min, etc.

Structs/Nested.html#/s:11DiscoveryV16Nes.name: path
Structs/Nested.html#/s:11DiscoveryV16Nes.abstract: The area of the results the aggregation was restricted to.

Structs/Timeslice.html#/s:11DiscoveryV19.name: type
Structs/Timeslice.html#/s:11DiscoveryV19.abstract: The type of aggregation command used. For example: term, filter, max, min, etc.

Structs/Timeslice.html#/s:11DiscoveryV19.name: field
Structs/Timeslice.html#/s:11DiscoveryV19.abstract: The field where the aggregation is located in the document.

Structs/Timeslice.html#/s:11DiscoveryV19.name: interval
Structs/Timeslice.html#/s:11DiscoveryV19.abstract: Interval of the aggregation. Valid date interval values are second/seconds minute/minutes, hour/hours, day/days, week/weeks, month/months, and year/years.

Structs/Timeslice.html#/s:11DiscoveryV19.name: anomaly
Structs/Timeslice.html#/s:11DiscoveryV19.abstract: Used to inducate that anomaly detection should be performed. Anomaly detection is used to locate unusual datapoints within a time series.

Structs/DocumentStatus/Status.html.name: Status
Structs/DocumentStatus/Status.html.abstract: Status of the document in the ingestion process.

Structs/DocumentStatus/FileType.html.name: FileType
Structs/DocumentStatus/FileType.html.abstract: The type of the original source file.

Structs/DocumentStatus.html#/s:11Discove.name: created
Structs/DocumentStatus.html#/s:11Discove.abstract: The creation date of the document in the format yyyy-MM-dd’T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z’.

Structs/DocumentStatus.html#/s:11Discove.name: updated
Structs/DocumentStatus.html#/s:11Discove.abstract: Date of the most recent document update, in the format yyyy-MM-dd’T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z’.

Structs/DocumentStatus.html#/s:11Discove.name: status
Structs/DocumentStatus.html#/s:11Discove.abstract: Status of the document in the ingestion process.

Structs/DocumentStatus.html#/s:11Discove.name: filename
Structs/DocumentStatus.html#/s:11Discove.abstract: Name of the original source file (if available).

Structs/DocumentStatus.html#/s:11Discove.name: fileType
Structs/DocumentStatus.html#/s:11Discove.abstract: The type of the original source file.

Structs/DocumentStatus.html#/s:11Discove.name: sha1
Structs/DocumentStatus.html#/s:11Discove.abstract: The SHA-1 hash of the original source file (formatted as a hexadecimal string).

Structs/DocumentStatus.html#/s:11Discove.name: notices
Structs/DocumentStatus.html#/s:11Discove.abstract: Array of notices produced by the document-ingestion process.

Structs/Conversions.html#/s:11DiscoveryV.name: jsonNormalizations
Structs/Conversions.html#/s:11DiscoveryV.abstract: Defines operations that can be used to transform the final output JSON into a normalized form. Operations are executed in the order that they appear in the array.

Structs/QueryEntities.html#/s:11Discover.name: feature
Structs/QueryEntities.html#/s:11Discover.abstract: The entity query feature to perform. Supported features are disambiguate and similar_entities.

Structs/QueryEntities.html#/s:11Discover.name: entity
Structs/QueryEntities.html#/s:11Discover.abstract: A text string that appears within the entity text field.

Structs/QueryEntities.html#/s:11Discover.name: context
Structs/QueryEntities.html#/s:11Discover.abstract: Entity text to provide context for the queried entity and rank based on that association. For example, if you wanted to query the city of London in England your query would look for London with the context of England.

Structs/QueryEntities.html#/s:11Discover.name: count
Structs/QueryEntities.html#/s:11Discover.abstract: The number of results to return. The default is 10. The maximum is 1000.

Structs/QueryEntities.html#/s:11Discover.name: evidenceCount
Structs/QueryEntities.html#/s:11Discover.abstract: The number of evidence items to return for each result. The default is 0. The maximum number of evidence items per query is 10,000.

Structs/Expansions.html#/s:11DiscoveryV1.name: expansions
Structs/Expansions.html#/s:11DiscoveryV1.abstract: An array of query expansion definitions. Each object in the expansions array represents a term or set of terms that will be expanded into other terms. Each expansion object can be configured so that all terms are expanded to all other terms in the object - bi-directional, or a set list of terms can be expanded into a second list of terms - uni-directional. To create a bi-directional expansion specify an expanded_terms array. When found in a query, all items in the expanded_terms array are then expanded to the other items in the same array. To create a uni-directional expansion, specify both an array of input_terms and an array of expanded_terms. When items in the input_terms array are present in a query, they are expanded using the items listed in the expanded_terms array.

Structs/NormalizationOperation/Operation.name: Operation
Structs/NormalizationOperation/Operation.abstract: Identifies what type of operation to perform.

Structs/NormalizationOperation.html#/s:1.name: operation
Structs/NormalizationOperation.html#/s:1.abstract: Identifies what type of operation to perform.

Structs/NluEnrichmentEntities.html#/s:11.name: sentiment
Structs/NluEnrichmentEntities.html#/s:11.abstract: When true, sentiment analysis of entities will be performed on the specified field.

Structs/NluEnrichmentEntities.html#/s:11.name: emotion
Structs/NluEnrichmentEntities.html#/s:11.abstract: When true, emotion detection of entities will be performed on the specified field.

Structs/NluEnrichmentEntities.html#/s:11.name: limit
Structs/NluEnrichmentEntities.html#/s:11.abstract: The maximum number of entities to extract for each instance of the specified field.

Structs/NluEnrichmentEntities.html#/s:11.name: mentions
Structs/NluEnrichmentEntities.html#/s:11.abstract: When true, the number of mentions of each identified entity is recorded. The default is false.

Structs/NluEnrichmentEntities.html#/s:11.name: mentionTypes
Structs/NluEnrichmentEntities.html#/s:11.abstract: When true, the types of mentions for each idetifieid entity is recorded. The default is false.

Structs/NluEnrichmentEntities.html#/s:11.name: sentenceLocation
Structs/NluEnrichmentEntities.html#/s:11.abstract: When true, a list of sentence locations for each instance of each identified entity is recorded. The default is false.

Structs/NluEnrichmentEntities.html#/s:11.name: model
Structs/NluEnrichmentEntities.html#/s:11.abstract: The enrichement model to use with entity extraction. May be a custom model provided by Watson Knowledge Studio, the public model for use with Knowledge Graph en-news, or the default public model alchemy.

Structs/ListConfigurationsResponse.html#.name: configurations
Structs/ListConfigurationsResponse.html#.abstract: An array of Configurations that are available for the service instance.

Structs/QueryRelationsFilter.html#/s:11D.name: relationTypes
Structs/QueryRelationsFilter.html#/s:11D.abstract: A list of relation types to include or exclude from the query.

Structs/QueryRelationsFilter.html#/s:11D.name: entityTypes
Structs/QueryRelationsFilter.html#/s:11D.abstract: A list of entity types to include or exclude from the query.

Structs/QueryRelationsFilter.html#/s:11D.name: documentIds
Structs/QueryRelationsFilter.html#/s:11D.abstract: A comma-separated list of document IDs to include in the query.

Structs/Configuration.html#/s:11Discover.name: created
Structs/Configuration.html#/s:11Discover.abstract: The creation date of the configuration in the format yyyy-MM-dd’T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z’.

Structs/Configuration.html#/s:11Discover.name: updated
Structs/Configuration.html#/s:11Discover.abstract: The timestamp of when the configuration was last updated in the format yyyy-MM-dd’T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z’.

Structs/Configuration.html#/s:11Discover.name: description
Structs/Configuration.html#/s:11Discover.abstract: The description of the configuration, if available.

Structs/Configuration.html#/s:11Discover.name: conversions
Structs/Configuration.html#/s:11Discover.abstract: The document conversion settings for the configuration.

Structs/Configuration.html#/s:11Discover.name: enrichments
Structs/Configuration.html#/s:11Discover.abstract: An array of document enrichment settings for the configuration.

Structs/Configuration.html#/s:11Discover.name: normalizations
Structs/Configuration.html#/s:11Discover.abstract: Defines operations that can be used to transform the final output JSON into a normalized form. Operations are executed in the order that they appear in the array.

Structs/NluEnrichmentEmotion.html#/s:11D.name: document
Structs/NluEnrichmentEmotion.html#/s:11D.abstract: When true, emotion detection is performed on the entire field.

Structs/NluEnrichmentEmotion.html#/s:11D.name: targets
Structs/NluEnrichmentEmotion.html#/s:11D.abstract: A comma-separated list of target strings that will have any associated emotions detected.

Structs/Environment.html#/s:11DiscoveryV.name: created
Structs/Environment.html#/s:11DiscoveryV.abstract: Creation date of the environment, in the format yyyy-MM-dd’T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z’.

Structs/Environment.html#/s:11DiscoveryV.name: updated
Structs/Environment.html#/s:11DiscoveryV.abstract: Date of most recent environment update, in the format yyyy-MM-dd’T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z’.

Structs/Environment.html#/s:11DiscoveryV.name: readOnly
Structs/Environment.html#/s:11DiscoveryV.abstract: If true, then the environment contains read-only collections which are maintained by IBM.

Structs/Environment.html#/s:11DiscoveryV.name: indexCapacity
Structs/Environment.html#/s:11DiscoveryV.abstract: Details about the resource usage and capacity of the environment.

Structs/QueryRelations/Sort.html.name: Sort
Structs/QueryRelations/Sort.html.abstract: The sorting method for the relationships, can be score or frequency. frequency is the number of unique times each entity is identified. The default is score.

Structs/QueryRelations.html#/s:11Discove.name: entities
Structs/QueryRelations.html#/s:11Discove.abstract: An array of entities to find relationships for.

Structs/QueryRelations.html#/s:11Discove.name: context
Structs/QueryRelations.html#/s:11Discove.abstract: Entity text to provide context for the queried entity and rank based on that association. For example, if you wanted to query the city of London in England your query would look for London with the context of England.

Structs/QueryRelations.html#/s:11Discove.name: sort
Structs/QueryRelations.html#/s:11Discove.abstract: The sorting method for the relationships, can be score or frequency. frequency is the number of unique times each entity is identified. The default is score.

Structs/QueryRelations.html#/s:11Discove.name: filter
Structs/QueryRelations.html#/s:11Discove.abstract: Filters to apply to the relationship query.

Structs/QueryRelations.html#/s:11Discove.name: count
Structs/QueryRelations.html#/s:11Discove.abstract: The number of results to return. The default is 10. The maximum is 1000.

Structs/QueryRelations.html#/s:11Discove.name: evidenceCount
Structs/QueryRelations.html#/s:11Discove.abstract: The number of evidence items to return for each result. The default is 0. The maximum number of evidence items per query is 10,000.

Structs/NluEnrichmentKeywords.html#/s:11.name: sentiment
Structs/NluEnrichmentKeywords.html#/s:11.abstract: When true, sentiment analysis of keywords will be performed on the specified field.

Structs/NluEnrichmentKeywords.html#/s:11.name: emotion
Structs/NluEnrichmentKeywords.html#/s:11.abstract: When true, emotion detection of keywords will be performed on the specified field.

Structs/NluEnrichmentKeywords.html#/s:11.name: limit
Structs/NluEnrichmentKeywords.html#/s:11.abstract: The maximum number of keywords to extract for each instance of the specified field.

Structs/Enrichment.html#/s:11DiscoveryV1.name: destinationField
Structs/Enrichment.html#/s:11DiscoveryV1.abstract: Field where enrichments will be stored. This field must already exist or be at most 1 level deeper than an existing field. For example, if text is a top-level field with no sub-fields, text.foo is a valid destination but text.foo.bar is not.

Structs/Enrichment.html#/s:11DiscoveryV1.name: overwrite
Structs/Enrichment.html#/s:11DiscoveryV1.abstract: Indicates that the enrichments will overwrite the destination_field field if it already exists.

Structs/Enrichment.html#/s:11DiscoveryV1.name: enrichmentName
Structs/Enrichment.html#/s:11DiscoveryV1.abstract: Name of the enrichment service to call. Current options are natural_language_understanding and elements. When using natual_language_understanding, the options object must contain Natural Language Understanding Options. When using elements the options object must contain Element Classification options. Additionally, when using the elements enrichment the configuration specified and files ingested must meet all the criteria specified in the documentation Previous API versions also supported alchemy_language.

Structs/Enrichment.html#/s:11DiscoveryV1.name: ignoreDownstreamErrors
Structs/Enrichment.html#/s:11DiscoveryV1.abstract: If true, then most errors generated during the enrichment process will be treated as warnings and will not cause the document to fail processing.

Structs/Enrichment.html#/s:11DiscoveryV1.name: options
Structs/Enrichment.html#/s:11DiscoveryV1.abstract: A list of options specific to the enrichment.

Structs/NluEnrichmentSemanticRoles.html#.name: entities
Structs/NluEnrichmentSemanticRoles.html#.abstract: When true entities are extracted from the identified sentence parts.

Structs/NluEnrichmentSemanticRoles.html#.name: keywords
Structs/NluEnrichmentSemanticRoles.html#.abstract: When true, keywords are extracted from the identified sentence parts.

Structs/NluEnrichmentSemanticRoles.html#.name: limit
Structs/NluEnrichmentSemanticRoles.html#.abstract: The maximum number of semantic roles enrichments to extact from each instance of the specified field.

Structs/MemoryUsage.html#/s:11DiscoveryV.name: usedBytes
Structs/MemoryUsage.html#/s:11DiscoveryV.abstract: Deprecated**: Number of bytes used in the environment’s memory capacity.

Structs/MemoryUsage.html#/s:11DiscoveryV.name: totalBytes
Structs/MemoryUsage.html#/s:11DiscoveryV.abstract: Deprecated**: Total number of bytes available in the environment’s memory capacity.

Structs/MemoryUsage.html#/s:11DiscoveryV.name: used
Structs/MemoryUsage.html#/s:11DiscoveryV.abstract: Deprecated**: Amount of memory capacity used, in KB or GB format.

Structs/MemoryUsage.html#/s:11DiscoveryV.name: total
Structs/MemoryUsage.html#/s:11DiscoveryV.abstract: Deprecated**: Total amount of the environment’s memory capacity, in KB or GB format.

Structs/MemoryUsage.html#/s:11DiscoveryV.name: percentUsed
Structs/MemoryUsage.html#/s:11DiscoveryV.abstract: Deprecated**: Percentage of the environment’s memory capacity that is being used.

Structs/QueryEntitiesContext.html#/s:11D.name: text
Structs/QueryEntitiesContext.html#/s:11D.abstract: Entity text to provide context for the queried entity and rank based on that association. For example, if you wanted to query the city of London in England your query would look for London with the context of England.

Structs/EnvironmentDocuments.html#/s:11D.name: indexed
Structs/EnvironmentDocuments.html#/s:11D.abstract: Number of documents indexed for the environment.

Structs/EnvironmentDocuments.html#/s:11D.name: maximumAllowed
Structs/EnvironmentDocuments.html#/s:11D.abstract: Total number of documents allowed in the environment’s capacity.

Structs/DeleteDocumentResponse/Status.ht.name: Status
Structs/DeleteDocumentResponse/Status.ht.abstract: Status of the document. A deleted document has the status deleted.

Structs/DeleteDocumentResponse.html#/s:1.name: status
Structs/DeleteDocumentResponse.html#/s:1.abstract: Status of the document. A deleted document has the status deleted.

Structs/DeleteConfigurationResponse/Stat.name: Status
Structs/DeleteConfigurationResponse/Stat.abstract: Status of the configuration. A deleted configuration has the status deleted.

Structs/DeleteConfigurationResponse.html.name: status
Structs/DeleteConfigurationResponse.html.abstract: Status of the configuration. A deleted configuration has the status deleted.

Structs/DeleteConfigurationResponse.html.name: notices
Structs/DeleteConfigurationResponse.html.abstract: An array of notice messages, if any.

Structs/Filter.html#/s:11DiscoveryV16Fil.name: type
Structs/Filter.html#/s:11DiscoveryV16Fil.abstract: The type of aggregation command used. For example: term, filter, max, min, etc.

Structs/Filter.html#/s:11DiscoveryV16Fil.name: match
Structs/Filter.html#/s:11DiscoveryV16Fil.abstract: The match the aggregated results queried for.

Structs/TestDocument.html#/s:11Discovery.name: enrichedFieldUnits
Structs/TestDocument.html#/s:11Discovery.abstract: The number of 10-kB chunks of field data that were enriched. This can be used to estimate the cost of running a real ingestion.

Structs/TestDocument.html#/s:11Discovery.name: snapshots
Structs/TestDocument.html#/s:11Discovery.abstract: An array of objects that describe each step in the preview process.

Structs/TestDocument.html#/s:11Discovery.name: notices
Structs/TestDocument.html#/s:11Discovery.abstract: An array of notice messages about the preview operation.

Structs/IndexCapacity.html#/s:11Discover.name: documents
Structs/IndexCapacity.html#/s:11Discover.abstract: Summary of the document usage statistics for the environment.

Structs/IndexCapacity.html#/s:11Discover.name: diskUsage
Structs/IndexCapacity.html#/s:11Discover.abstract: Summary of the disk usage of the environment.

Structs/IndexCapacity.html#/s:11Discover.name: collections
Structs/IndexCapacity.html#/s:11Discover.abstract: Summary of the collection usage in the environment.

Structs/IndexCapacity.html#/s:11Discover.name: memoryUsage
Structs/IndexCapacity.html#/s:11Discover.abstract: Deprecated**: Summary of the memory usage of the environment.

Structs/DocumentAccepted/Status.html.name: Status
Structs/DocumentAccepted/Status.html.abstract: Status of the document in the ingestion process.

Structs/DocumentAccepted.html#/s:11Disco.name: documentID
Structs/DocumentAccepted.html#/s:11Disco.abstract: The unique identifier of the ingested document.

Structs/DocumentAccepted.html#/s:11Disco.name: status
Structs/DocumentAccepted.html#/s:11Disco.abstract: Status of the document in the ingestion process.

Structs/DocumentAccepted.html#/s:11Disco.name: notices
Structs/DocumentAccepted.html#/s:11Disco.abstract: Array of notices produced by the document-ingestion process.

Structs/Notice.html#/s:11DiscoveryV16Not.name: noticeID
Structs/Notice.html#/s:11DiscoveryV16Not.abstract: Identifies the notice. Many notices might have the same ID. This field exists so that user applications can programmatically identify a notice and take automatic corrective action.

Structs/Notice.html#/s:11DiscoveryV16Not.name: created
Structs/Notice.html#/s:11DiscoveryV16Not.abstract: The creation date of the collection in the format yyyy-MM-dd’T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z’.

Structs/Notice.html#/s:11DiscoveryV16Not.name: queryID
Structs/Notice.html#/s:11DiscoveryV16Not.abstract: Unique identifier of the query used for relevance training.

Structs/Notice.html#/s:11DiscoveryV16Not.name: step
Structs/Notice.html#/s:11DiscoveryV16Not.abstract: Ingestion or training step in which the notice occurred.

Structs/QueryResult.html#/s:11DiscoveryV.name: score
Structs/QueryResult.html#/s:11DiscoveryV.abstract: Deprecated* This field is now part of the result_metadata object.

Structs/QueryResult.html#/s:11DiscoveryV.name: collectionID
Structs/QueryResult.html#/s:11DiscoveryV.abstract: The collection ID of the collection containing the document for this result.

Structs/CreateCollectionRequest/Language.name: Language
Structs/CreateCollectionRequest/Language.abstract: The language of the documents stored in the collection, in the form of an ISO 639-1 language code.

Structs/CreateCollectionRequest.html#/s:.name: name
Structs/CreateCollectionRequest.html#/s:.abstract: The name of the collection to be created.

Structs/CreateCollectionRequest.html#/s:.name: configurationID
Structs/CreateCollectionRequest.html#/s:.abstract: The ID of the configuration in which the collection is to be created.

Structs/CreateCollectionRequest.html#/s:.name: language
Structs/CreateCollectionRequest.html#/s:.abstract: The language of the documents stored in the collection, in the form of an ISO 639-1 language code.

Structs/AggregationResult.html#/s:11Disc.name: aggregations
Structs/AggregationResult.html#/s:11Disc.abstract: Aggregations returned in the case of chained aggregations.

Structs/GenericQueryAggregation.html#/s:.name: type
Structs/GenericQueryAggregation.html#/s:.abstract: The type of aggregation command used. For example: term, filter, max, min, etc.

Structs/QueryEvidenceEntity.html#/s:11Di.name: type
Structs/QueryEvidenceEntity.html#/s:11Di.abstract: The entity type for this entity. Possible types vary based on model used.

Structs/QueryEvidenceEntity.html#/s:11Di.name: text
Structs/QueryEvidenceEntity.html#/s:11Di.abstract: The original text of this entity as found in the evidence field.

Structs/QueryEvidenceEntity.html#/s:11Di.name: startOffset
Structs/QueryEvidenceEntity.html#/s:11Di.abstract: The start location of the entity text in the identified field. This value is inclusive.

Structs/QueryEvidenceEntity.html#/s:11Di.name: endOffset
Structs/QueryEvidenceEntity.html#/s:11Di.abstract: The end location of the entity text in the identified field. This value is exclusive.

Structs/ListCollectionFieldsResponse.htm.name: fields
Structs/ListCollectionFieldsResponse.htm.abstract: An array containing information about each field in the collections.

Structs/QueryEvidence.html#/s:11Discover.name: documentID
Structs/QueryEvidence.html#/s:11Discover.abstract: The docuemnt ID (as indexed in Discovery) of the evidence location.

Structs/QueryEvidence.html#/s:11Discover.name: field
Structs/QueryEvidence.html#/s:11Discover.abstract: The field of the document where the supporting evidence was identified.

Structs/QueryEvidence.html#/s:11Discover.name: startOffset
Structs/QueryEvidence.html#/s:11Discover.abstract: The start location of the evidence in the identified field. This value is inclusive.

Structs/QueryEvidence.html#/s:11Discover.name: endOffset
Structs/QueryEvidence.html#/s:11Discover.abstract: The end location of the evidence in the identified field. This value is inclusive.

Structs/QueryEvidence.html#/s:11Discover.name: entities
Structs/QueryEvidence.html#/s:11Discover.abstract: An array of entity objects that show evidence of the result.

Structs/QueryFilterType.html#/s:11Discov.name: exclude
Structs/QueryFilterType.html#/s:11Discov.abstract: A comma-separated list of types to exclude.

Structs/QueryFilterType.html#/s:11Discov.name: include
Structs/QueryFilterType.html#/s:11Discov.abstract: A comma-separated list of types to include. All other types are excluded.

Structs/Calculation.html#/s:11DiscoveryV.name: type
Structs/Calculation.html#/s:11DiscoveryV.abstract: The type of aggregation command used. For example: term, filter, max, min, etc.

Structs/Calculation.html#/s:11DiscoveryV.name: field
Structs/Calculation.html#/s:11DiscoveryV.abstract: The field where the aggregation is located in the document.

Structs/EnrichmentOptions.html#/s:11Disc.name: features
Structs/EnrichmentOptions.html#/s:11Disc.abstract: An object representing the enrichment features that will be applied to the specified field.

Structs/EnrichmentOptions.html#/s:11Disc.name: model
Structs/EnrichmentOptions.html#/s:11Disc.abstract: For use with elements enrichments only.* The element extraction model to use. Models available are: contract.

Structs/Collection.html#/s:11DiscoveryV1.name: created
Structs/Collection.html#/s:11DiscoveryV1.abstract: The creation date of the collection in the format yyyy-MM-dd’T'HH:mmcon:ss.SSS'Z’.

Structs/Collection.html#/s:11DiscoveryV1.name: updated
Structs/Collection.html#/s:11DiscoveryV1.abstract: The timestamp of when the collection was last updated in the format yyyy-MM-dd’T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z’.

Structs/Collection.html#/s:11DiscoveryV1.name: configurationID
Structs/Collection.html#/s:11DiscoveryV1.abstract: The unique identifier of the collection’s configuration.

Structs/Collection.html#/s:11DiscoveryV1.name: language
Structs/Collection.html#/s:11DiscoveryV1.abstract: The language of the documents stored in the collection. Permitted values include en (English), de (German), and es (Spanish).

Structs/Collection.html#/s:11DiscoveryV1.name: documentCounts
Structs/Collection.html#/s:11DiscoveryV1.abstract: The object providing information about the documents in the collection. Present only when retrieving details of a collection.

Structs/Collection.html#/s:11DiscoveryV1.name: diskUsage
Structs/Collection.html#/s:11DiscoveryV1.abstract: The object providing information about the disk usage of the collection. Present only when retrieving details of a collection.

Structs/Collection.html#/s:11DiscoveryV1.name: trainingStatus
Structs/Collection.html#/s:11DiscoveryV1.abstract: Provides information about the status of relevance training for collection.

Structs/Expansion.html#/s:11DiscoveryV19.name: inputTerms
Structs/Expansion.html#/s:11DiscoveryV19.abstract: A list of terms that will be expanded for this expansion. If specified, only the items in this list are expanded.

Structs/Expansion.html#/s:11DiscoveryV19.name: expandedTerms
Structs/Expansion.html#/s:11DiscoveryV19.abstract: A list of terms that this expansion will be expanded to. If specified without input_terms, it also functions as the input term list.

Structs/CollectionDiskUsage.html#/s:11Di.name: usedBytes
Structs/CollectionDiskUsage.html#/s:11Di.abstract: Number of bytes used by the collection.

Structs/QueryRelationsRelationship.html#.name: frequency
Structs/QueryRelationsRelationship.html#.abstract: The number of times the relationship is mentioned.

Structs/QueryRelationsRelationship.html#.name: evidence
Structs/QueryRelationsRelationship.html#.abstract: List of different evidentiary items to support the result.

Structs/DiskUsage.html#/s:11DiscoveryV19.name: usedBytes
Structs/DiskUsage.html#/s:11DiscoveryV19.abstract: Number of bytes used on the environment’s disk capacity.

Structs/DiskUsage.html#/s:11DiscoveryV19.name: maximumAllowedBytes
Structs/DiskUsage.html#/s:11DiscoveryV19.abstract: Total number of bytes available in the environment’s disk capacity.

Structs/DiskUsage.html#/s:11DiscoveryV19.name: totalBytes
Structs/DiskUsage.html#/s:11DiscoveryV19.abstract: Deprecated**: Total number of bytes available in the environment’s disk capacity.

Structs/DiskUsage.html#/s:11DiscoveryV19.name: used
Structs/DiskUsage.html#/s:11DiscoveryV19.abstract: Deprecated**: Amount of disk capacity used, in KB or GB format.

Structs/DiskUsage.html#/s:11DiscoveryV19.name: total
Structs/DiskUsage.html#/s:11DiscoveryV19.abstract: Deprecated**: Total amount of the environment’s disk capacity, in KB or GB format.

Structs/DiskUsage.html#/s:11DiscoveryV19.name: percentUsed
Structs/DiskUsage.html#/s:11DiscoveryV19.abstract: Deprecated**: Percentage of the environment’s disk capacity that is being used.

Structs/Histogram.html#/s:11DiscoveryV19.name: type
Structs/Histogram.html#/s:11DiscoveryV19.abstract: The type of aggregation command used. For example: term, filter, max, min, etc.

Structs/Histogram.html#/s:11DiscoveryV19.name: field
Structs/Histogram.html#/s:11DiscoveryV19.abstract: The field where the aggregation is located in the document.

Structs/NluEnrichmentSentiment.html#/s:1.name: document
Structs/NluEnrichmentSentiment.html#/s:1.abstract: When true, sentiment analysis is performed on the entire field.

Structs/NluEnrichmentSentiment.html#/s:1.name: targets
Structs/NluEnrichmentSentiment.html#/s:1.abstract: A comma-separated list of target strings that will have any associated sentiment analyzed.

Structs/NluEnrichmentFeatures.html#/s:11.name: keywords
Structs/NluEnrichmentFeatures.html#/s:11.abstract: An object specifying the Keyword enrichment and related parameters.

Structs/NluEnrichmentFeatures.html#/s:11.name: entities
Structs/NluEnrichmentFeatures.html#/s:11.abstract: An object speficying the Entities enrichment and related parameters.

Structs/NluEnrichmentFeatures.html#/s:11.name: sentiment
Structs/NluEnrichmentFeatures.html#/s:11.abstract: An object specifying the sentiment extraction enrichment and related parameters.

Structs/NluEnrichmentFeatures.html#/s:11.name: emotion
Structs/NluEnrichmentFeatures.html#/s:11.abstract: An object specifying the emotion detection enrichment and related parameters.

Structs/NluEnrichmentFeatures.html#/s:11.name: categories
Structs/NluEnrichmentFeatures.html#/s:11.abstract: An object specifying the categories enrichment and related parameters.

Structs/NluEnrichmentFeatures.html#/s:11.name: semanticRoles
Structs/NluEnrichmentFeatures.html#/s:11.abstract: An object specifiying the semantic roles enrichment and related parameters.

Structs/NluEnrichmentFeatures.html#/s:11.name: relations
Structs/NluEnrichmentFeatures.html#/s:11.abstract: An object specifying the relations enrichment and related parameters.

Structs/TopHits.html#/s:11DiscoveryV17To.name: type
Structs/TopHits.html#/s:11DiscoveryV17To.abstract: The type of aggregation command used. For example: term, filter, max, min, etc.

Structs/TopHits.html#/s:11DiscoveryV17To.name: size
Structs/TopHits.html#/s:11DiscoveryV17To.abstract: Number of top hits returned by the aggregation.

Structs/ListEnvironmentsResponse.html#/s.name: environments
Structs/ListEnvironmentsResponse.html#/s.abstract: An array of [environments] that are available for the service instance.

Structs/QueryNoticesResult/FileType.html.name: FileType
Structs/QueryNoticesResult/FileType.html.abstract: The type of the original source file.

Structs/QueryNoticesResult.html#/s:11Dis.name: score
Structs/QueryNoticesResult.html#/s:11Dis.abstract: Deprecated* This field is now part of the result_metadata object.

Structs/QueryNoticesResult.html#/s:11Dis.name: collectionID
Structs/QueryNoticesResult.html#/s:11Dis.abstract: The collection ID of the collection containing the document for this result.

Structs/QueryNoticesResult.html#/s:11Dis.name: code
Structs/QueryNoticesResult.html#/s:11Dis.abstract: The internal status code returned by the ingestion subsystem indicating the overall result of ingesting the source document.

Structs/QueryNoticesResult.html#/s:11Dis.name: filename
Structs/QueryNoticesResult.html#/s:11Dis.abstract: Name of the original source file (if available).

Structs/QueryNoticesResult.html#/s:11Dis.name: fileType
Structs/QueryNoticesResult.html#/s:11Dis.abstract: The type of the original source file.

Structs/QueryNoticesResult.html#/s:11Dis.name: sha1
Structs/QueryNoticesResult.html#/s:11Dis.abstract: The SHA-1 hash of the original source file (formatted as a hexadecimal string).

Structs/QueryEntitiesResponseItem.html#/.name: evidence
Structs/QueryEntitiesResponseItem.html#/.abstract: List of different evidentiary items to support the result.

Structs/QueryResultMetadata.html#/s:11Di.name: score
Structs/QueryResultMetadata.html#/s:11Di.abstract: The confidence score of the result’s analysis. A higher score indicating greater confidence.

Structs/QueryRelationsEntity.html#/s:11D.name: exact
Structs/QueryRelationsEntity.html#/s:11D.abstract: If false, implicit querying is performed. The default is false.

Structs/QueryPassages.html#/s:11Discover.name: documentID
Structs/QueryPassages.html#/s:11Discover.abstract: The unique identifier of the document from which the passage has been extracted.

Structs/QueryPassages.html#/s:11Discover.name: passageScore
Structs/QueryPassages.html#/s:11Discover.abstract: The confidence score of the passages’s analysis. A higher score indicates greater confidence.

Structs/QueryPassages.html#/s:11Discover.name: startOffset
Structs/QueryPassages.html#/s:11Discover.abstract: The position of the first character of the extracted passage in the originating field.

Structs/QueryPassages.html#/s:11Discover.name: endOffset
Structs/QueryPassages.html#/s:11Discover.abstract: The position of the last character of the extracted passage in the originating field.

Structs/QueryPassages.html#/s:11Discover.name: field
Structs/QueryPassages.html#/s:11Discover.abstract: The label of the field from which the passage has been extracted.

Structs/ListCollectionsResponse.html#/s:.name: collections
Structs/ListCollectionsResponse.html#/s:.abstract: An array containing information about each collection in the environment.

Structs/DeleteCollectionResponse/Status..name: Status
Structs/DeleteCollectionResponse/Status..abstract: The status of the collection. The status of a successful deletion operation is deleted.

Structs/DeleteCollectionResponse.html#/s.name: collectionID
Structs/DeleteCollectionResponse.html#/s.abstract: The unique identifier of the collection that is being deleted.

Structs/DeleteCollectionResponse.html#/s.name: status
Structs/DeleteCollectionResponse.html#/s.abstract: The status of the collection. The status of a successful deletion operation is deleted.

Structs/CollectionUsage.html#/s:11Discov.name: available
Structs/CollectionUsage.html#/s:11Discov.abstract: Number of active collections in the environment.

Structs/CollectionUsage.html#/s:11Discov.name: maximumAllowed
Structs/CollectionUsage.html#/s:11Discov.abstract: Total number of collections allowed in the environment.

Structs/CollectionUsage.html.name: CollectionUsage
Structs/CollectionUsage.html.abstract: Summary of the collection usage in the environment.

Structs/NluEnrichmentSentiment.html.name: NluEnrichmentSentiment
Structs/NluEnrichmentSentiment.html.abstract: An object specifying the sentiment extraction enrichment and related parameters.

Structs/DiskUsage.html.name: DiskUsage
Structs/DiskUsage.html.abstract: Summary of the disk usage statistics for the environment.

Structs.html#/s:11DiscoveryV111JSONWrapp.name: JSONWrapper
Structs.html#/s:11DiscoveryV111JSONWrapp.abstract: Used internally to serialize and deserialize JSON.

Structs/QueryEntitiesEntity.html.name: QueryEntitiesEntity
Structs/QueryEntitiesEntity.html.abstract: A text string that appears within the entity text field.

Structs/CollectionDiskUsage.html.name: CollectionDiskUsage
Structs/CollectionDiskUsage.html.abstract: Summary of the disk usage statistics for this collection.

Structs/QueryEntitiesResponse.html.name: QueryEntitiesResponse
Structs/QueryEntitiesResponse.html.abstract: An array of entities resulting from the query.

Structs/Expansion.html.name: Expansion
Structs/Expansion.html.abstract: An expansion definition. Each object respresents one set of expandable strings. For example, you could have expansions for the word hot in one object, and expansions for the word cold in another.

Structs/EnrichmentOptions.html.name: EnrichmentOptions
Structs/EnrichmentOptions.html.abstract: Options which are specific to a particular enrichment.

Structs/QueryResponse.html.name: QueryResponse
Structs/QueryResponse.html.abstract: A response containing the documents and aggregations for the query.

Structs/QueryEvidence.html.name: QueryEvidence
Structs/QueryEvidence.html.abstract: Description of evidence location supporting Knoweldge Graph query result.

Structs/ListCollectionFieldsResponse.htm.name: ListCollectionFieldsResponse
Structs/ListCollectionFieldsResponse.htm.abstract: The list of fetched fields. The fields are returned using a fully qualified name format, however, the format differs slightly from that used by the query operations. * Fields which contain nested JSON objects are assigned a type of nested. * Fields which belong to a nested object are prefixed with .properties (for example, warnings.properties.severity means that the warnings object has a property called severity). * Fields returned from the News collection are prefixed with v{N}-fullnews-t3-{YEAR}.mappings (for example, v5-fullnews-t3-2016.mappings.text.properties.author).

Structs/QueryEvidenceEntity.html.name: QueryEvidenceEntity
Structs/QueryEvidenceEntity.html.abstract: Entity description and location within evidence field.

Structs/GenericQueryAggregation.html.name: GenericQueryAggregation
Structs/GenericQueryAggregation.html.abstract: An aggregation produced by the Discovery service to analyze the input provided.

Structs/IndexCapacity.html.name: IndexCapacity
Structs/IndexCapacity.html.abstract: Details about the resource usage and capacity of the environment.

Structs/EnvironmentDocuments.html.name: EnvironmentDocuments
Structs/EnvironmentDocuments.html.abstract: Summary of the document usage statistics for the environment.

Structs/QueryEntitiesContext.html.name: QueryEntitiesContext
Structs/QueryEntitiesContext.html.abstract: Entity text to provide context for the queried entity and rank based on that association. For example, if you wanted to query the city of London in England your query would look for London with the context of England.

Structs/MemoryUsage.html.name: MemoryUsage
Structs/MemoryUsage.html.abstract: Deprecated**: Summary of the memory usage statistics for this environment.

Structs/NluEnrichmentSemanticRoles.html.name: NluEnrichmentSemanticRoles
Structs/NluEnrichmentSemanticRoles.html.abstract: An object specifiying the semantic roles enrichment and related parameters.

Structs/NluEnrichmentKeywords.html.name: NluEnrichmentKeywords
Structs/NluEnrichmentKeywords.html.abstract: An object specifying the Keyword enrichment and related parameters.

Structs/NluEnrichmentEmotion.html.name: NluEnrichmentEmotion
Structs/NluEnrichmentEmotion.html.abstract: An object specifying the emotion detection enrichment and related parameters.

Structs/NluEnrichmentEntities.html.name: NluEnrichmentEntities
Structs/NluEnrichmentEntities.html.abstract: An object speficying the Entities enrichment and related parameters.

Structs/Expansions.html.name: Expansions
Structs/Expansions.html.abstract: The query expansion definitions for the specified collection.

Structs/NluEnrichmentCategories.html.name: NluEnrichmentCategories
Structs/NluEnrichmentCategories.html.abstract: An object that indicates the Categories enrichment will be applied to the specified field.

Structs/NluEnrichmentRelations.html.name: NluEnrichmentRelations
Structs/NluEnrichmentRelations.html.abstract: An object specifying the relations enrichment and related parameters.

Enums/JSON.html#/s:11DiscoveryV14JSONO6d.abstract: A number value, represented as a double.

Enums/JSON.html#/s:11DiscoveryV14JSONOAC.name: init(from:)
Enums/JSON.html#/s:11DiscoveryV14JSONOAC.abstract: Initialize a JSON value from an encodable type.

Enums/JSON.html#/s:11DiscoveryV14JSONO7t.name: toValue(_:)
Enums/JSON.html#/s:11DiscoveryV14JSONO7t.abstract: Convert this JSON value to a decodable type.

Enums/RestError.html#/s:11DiscoveryV19Re.name: noResponse
Enums/RestError.html#/s:11DiscoveryV19Re.abstract: No response was received from the server.

Enums/RestError.html#/s:11DiscoveryV19Re.name: noData
Enums/RestError.html#/s:11DiscoveryV19Re.abstract: No data was returned from the server.

Enums/RestError.html#/s:11DiscoveryV19Re.name: encodingError
Enums/RestError.html#/s:11DiscoveryV19Re.abstract: Failed to replace special characters in the

Enums/RestError.html#/s:11DiscoveryV19Re.name: fileManagerError
Enums/RestError.html#/s:11DiscoveryV19Re.abstract: FileManager failed to handle the given file.

Enums/RestError.html#/s:11DiscoveryV19Re.name: failure
Enums/RestError.html#/s:11DiscoveryV19Re.abstract: An HTTP error with a status code and description.

Enums/QueryAggregation.html.name: QueryAggregation
Enums/QueryAggregation.html.abstract: An aggregation produced by the Discovery service to analyze the input provided.

Enums/RestError.html.name: RestError
Enums/RestError.html.abstract: An error from processing a network request or response.

Enums/JSON.html.name: JSON
Enums/JSON.html.abstract: A JSON value (one of string, number, object, array, true, false, or null).

Classes/Discovery.html#/s:11DiscoveryV10.name: serviceURL
Classes/Discovery.html#/s:11DiscoveryV10.abstract: The base URL to use when contacting the service.

Classes/Discovery.html#/s:11DiscoveryV10.name: defaultHeaders
Classes/Discovery.html#/s:11DiscoveryV10.abstract: The default HTTP headers for all requests to the service.

Classes/Discovery.html#/s:11DiscoveryV10.name: listTrainingData(environmentID:collectionID:failure:success:)
Classes/Discovery.html#/s:11DiscoveryV10.abstract: Lists the training data for this collection.

Classes/Discovery.html#/s:11DiscoveryV10.name: addTrainingData(environmentID:collectionID:naturalLanguageQuery:filter:examples:failure:success:)
Classes/Discovery.html#/s:11DiscoveryV10.abstract: Adds a query to the training data for this collection. The query can contain a filter and natural language query.

Classes/Discovery.html#/s:11DiscoveryV10.name: deleteAllTrainingData(environmentID:collectionID:failure:success:)
Classes/Discovery.html#/s:11DiscoveryV10.abstract: Clears all training data for this collection.

Classes/Discovery.html#/s:11DiscoveryV10.name: getTrainingData(environmentID:collectionID:queryID:failure:success:)
Classes/Discovery.html#/s:11DiscoveryV10.abstract: Shows details for a specific training data query, including the query string and all examples.

Classes/Discovery.html#/s:11DiscoveryV10.name: deleteTrainingData(environmentID:collectionID:queryID:failure:success:)
Classes/Discovery.html#/s:11DiscoveryV10.abstract: Removes the training data and all associated examples from the training data set.

Classes/Discovery.html#/s:11DiscoveryV10.name: listTrainingExamples(environmentID:collectionID:queryID:failure:success:)
Classes/Discovery.html#/s:11DiscoveryV10.abstract: List all examples for this training data query.

Classes/Discovery.html#/s:11DiscoveryV10.name: createTrainingExample(environmentID:collectionID:queryID:documentID:crossReference:relevance:failure:success:)
Classes/Discovery.html#/s:11DiscoveryV10.abstract: Adds a new example to this training data query.

Classes/Discovery.html#/s:11DiscoveryV10.name: deleteTrainingExample(environmentID:collectionID:queryID:exampleID:failure:success:)
Classes/Discovery.html#/s:11DiscoveryV10.abstract: Removes the example with the given ID for the training data query.

Classes/Discovery.html#/s:11DiscoveryV10.name: updateTrainingExample(environmentID:collectionID:queryID:exampleID:crossReference:relevance:failure:success:)
Classes/Discovery.html#/s:11DiscoveryV10.abstract: Changes the label or cross reference query for this training example.

Classes/Discovery.html#/s:11DiscoveryV10.name: getTrainingExample(environmentID:collectionID:queryID:exampleID:failure:success:)
Classes/Discovery.html#/s:11DiscoveryV10.abstract: Gets the details for this training example.

Classes/Discovery.html.name: Discovery
Classes/Discovery.html.abstract: The IBM Watson Discovery Service is a cognitive search and content analytics engine that you can add to applications to
